::Battera::

She sat there and blushed. "Thank you for your kind words."
She felt her face flush and turned her head away from Firearm.
"Yes, I would like to see the ship. It looks like a nice and pleasant 
ship from the outside. I have yet to have a tour. Rex wouldn't allow 
it. Maybe he would like to come too. This way he can keep his eye on 
me.  He doesn't exactly trust me." her voice sounded a little down.
"Trust is something that takes time to create.  While hate takes only 
seconds to make. I don't understand why this is, but it is."
She took a bite of the apple and looked at the table. 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Firearm::
> 
> Firearm nods. "Sure, thanks," he says, taking a fruit and eating it.
> 
> "Kluster won't mind a pretty bot walking around the base," Firearm 
says, 
> grinning as he starts to walk toward a table, "But he might get 
jealous 
> because he isn't the one with ya."
